DOC.brief_summary: To elucidate whether blood lactate, lipid transfer proteins and PPARs/CLOCK/Bal1 have a circadian rhythm
DOC.detailed_description: Blood will be drawn fasting and then every hour over a period of 24 hours in 30 healthy probands.
DOC.criteria: Age between 18 and 40 years old Inability/unwilling to give written informed consent Chronic disease
